member.summary: Listens for and processes incoming Open Sound Control packets.

member.summary: Creates a new instance of OscServer.
member.param: The local IP address to bind to.
The UDP port to bind to.

member.summary: Creates a new instance of OscServer.
member.param: The UDP port to bind to.
The multicast IP address to join.

member.name: M:Bespoke.Common.Osc.OscServer.#ctor(System.Net.TransportType,System.Net.IPAddress,System.Int32,System.Net.IPAddress,Bespoke.Common.Net.TransmissionType)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of OscServer.
member.param: The local IP address to bind to.
The UDP port to bind to.
The multicast IP address to join.
The transmission type for the server to use.
member.remarks: If ipAddress is specified, Unicast; otherwise, if multicastAddress is specified, Multicast.

member.name: M:Bespoke.Common.Osc.OscServer.#ctor(System.Net.TransportType,System.Net.IPAddress,System.Int32,System.Net.IPAddress,Bespoke.Common.Net.TransmissionType,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of OscServer.
member.param: The local IP address to bind to.
The UDP port to bind to.
The multicast IP address to join.
The transmission type for the server to use.
Specifies the behavior of handling parsing exceptions.
member.remarks: If ipAddress is specified, Unicast; otherwise, if multicastAddress is specified, Multicast.
